title: Imagine if Vayne took 30% true damage back everytime she procs her W
body: And has to be in melee auto attack range to do it.

replies.body: Yeah.. she'd be underpowered.. your point?
His point is Crossbow woman bad.

> [{quoted}](name=Sir Saltarin,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bLUws8OJ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-03-17T21:02:46.991+0000)
>
> His point is Crossbow woman bad.

Such a way with words

{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

Imagine if Vayne had a passive AS steroid, a spammable long-range slow, an AS/lifesteal steroid, and a button to ignore all disables.

Imagine if different champions were different.
What if Wukongs staff shrank around enemies reducing his attack range and Ult radius
what if kai sas suit decides for her to be devoured or kayle loses her divine might as she gains levels?
What if Karthus had to be in his passive to Ult? That is how dumb your statement is.
